definition: a person or animal that is fat has too much flesh on their body and weighs too much. It is not polite to call someone fat
Adverbs
a fat object is thicker than other objects of the same type
used about an amount of money that is very large
in: He’s got a rather fat face.
get fat: She can eat whatever she likes and she never gets fat.
a big fat cigar
a fat book/volume
a fat wallet
I bet he gets a nice fat salary!
The company made a fat profit this year.
fat chance
a fat lot
grow fat on something
the show/it isn’t over until the fat lady sings
